name: sports-app
description: A Progressive Web App for organizing and discovering casual sports activities

scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=backend && npm run build --workspace=frontend
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=backend && npm run type-check --workspace=frontend
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run docker:up && sleep 10 && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: echo 'Please copy .env.example to .env files and configure them'
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=backend && npm run clean --workspace=frontend
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run docker:down && docker volume prune -f
